question: When one prays the Qadha of Al-fajr prayer, shall one call the Adhaan like the Adhaan of Al-fajr or like the usual Adhaan.
answer:
QUESTION
When one prays the Qadha of Al-fajr prayer, shall one call the Adhaan like the Adhaan of Al-fajr (i.e. with AsSalatu Khayrun MinaNnawm) or like the usual Adhaan.
ANSWER


Share:
The Adhaan should called out like the Adhaan of Fajr Salaat.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
